__e: It took us six months to find the Adams girls and you lost her in one day?
I'm not sure mayor Adams and I see eye to eye on this.
Do you know if a family named Adams ever lived here?
And everyone said it was because he had been drinking, but Nurse Adams just said someone had a seizure.
Well, I don't want you going around repeating what Mrs. Adams didn't mean for you to hear.
All I know right now is that he's somewhere in the Adams Morgan district.
You had to go all the way to Adams Morgan to get me that.
The Adams Morgan hotel is across the street.
- Does Colonel Adams know about us?
If Detective Adams came here in his police car, he could have been here on duty.
It's not like we can prove that Adams isn't her real last name.
